author: Paul Rankin
method: Purée  the mango in a blender with the caster sugar and lime juice. Whip the double cream with the lime zest. Take a tall glass and start by layering with the mango purée and  lime cream.  Repeat this process and finish with the mango purée on top. Garnish with the mint to serve.
ingredients: ½ mango, cut up,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  1 lime, zest and juice only, (keep separate) ,  300ml/10½fl oz double cream,  fresh mint, to garnish
